title: Bug 47318org.aspectj.asm.IRelationship.Kind.ALL does not contain all kinds
description: org.aspectj.asm.IRelationship.Kind.ALL is an array that should contain all kindsthat an IRelationship may have. There are three possible kinds defined inIRelationship.java: ADVICE, DECLARE and DECLAREINTERTYPE. The Kind[] ALL doesonly contain ADVICE and DECLARE. This can lead to an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.
